0.1.name: wordpress/vortex
0.1.description: Vortex is a beautiful WordPress theme for any news, magazine or blog Website. It has light and optimized code with SEO friendly structure. The typography and white space promise comfortable reading pleasure. Vortex features custom background, custom menu, post thumbnails and custom header.
